description: Please make it interesting to read, the fonts and the positioning of everything is very bad

I was looking for a simple bible reader application and in that respect Biblereader is perfect for me. Add a bible and read it by switching between books/chapters. Nothing more, nothing less. However, there are so many sloppy UI decisions, that it's ultimately pretty bad.

-) buttons always span entire window width
-) the bible language selection opens a dropdown lists with hundreds of language tokens (no search)
-) no obvious way to exit the "Install new mods" section (you have to select a new bible passage)
-) doesn't remember last language selection after you exit
-) 2 side-by-side scrollable lists to choose book and chapter
-) text size gets adjusted with a slider (instead of setting the point size)
-) text formatting gets dictated by the source text
-) layout is reminiscent of unformatted HTML
-) no keyboard shortcuts for switching books/chapters

It also crashed repeatedly for me while trying to download new bibles/refreshing sources.

A real shame, because with a bit of work this program could be really good. But with the last commit being more than a year ago, I fear that this work will never be done.
